summary.problem: Email delivery failure with error code 550 5.1.10 indicating the recipient address does not exist or is incorrect in an Office 365 environment.
summary.solution: To resolve the 550 5.1.10 RecipientNotFound error in Office 365: 1) Verify the recipient email address is correctly spelled and exists. 2) Resend the message by opening the non-delivery report in Outlook or Outlook on the web, retyping the full recipient address without using autocomplete suggestions, and sending again. 3) Contact the recipient to confirm the address and check for any incorrect mail forwarding rules. 4) Clear the autocomplete cache for recipients in Outlook or Outlook on the web as described in the Microsoft article for error 5.1.10. 5) If you are an administrator, ensure the recipient has a valid Office 365 license, the email address is synchronized correctly in hybrid environments, and mail flow and MX records are properly configured. For detailed guidance, refer to the Microsoft support article: https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=532972
